text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
author: Philip Fisher

text: It's not whether you're right or wrong, but how much money you make when you're right and how much you lose when you're wrong.
author: George Soros

text: Health is the greatest of human blessings.
author: Hippocrates

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
author: Robert Arnott

text: Physical fitness is the first requisite of happiness.
author: Joseph Pilates

text: Artificial intelligence is the new electricity.
author: Andrew Ng

text: Your brain is like a muscle. When it is in use, we feel very good. Understanding is joyous.
author: Carl Sagan

text: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
author: P.T. Barnum

text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

text: Time in the market beats timing the market.

text: The groundwork of all happiness is health.

text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

text: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Walking is man's best medicine.
author: Hippocrates

text: The greatest wealth is health.
author: Virgil

text: The human brain has 100 billion neurons, each neuron connected to 10 thousand other neurons. Sitting on your shoulders is the most complicated object in the known universe.
author: Michio Kaku

text: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

text: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.

text: The doctor of the future will give no medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human frame, in diet, and in the cause and prevention of disease.

text: Artificial intelligence is not a man versus machine saga, it's man with machine versus problem.

text: The intelligent investor is a realist who sells to optimists and buys from pessimists.

text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.

text: An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.

text: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.

text: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.

text: Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. He who understands it, earns it. He who doesn't, pays it.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

text: Those who think they have no time for healthy eating will sooner or later have to find time for illness.

text: The pace of progress in artificial intelligence is incredibly fast.
author: Elon Musk

text: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.

text: The best investment you can make is in your own health.

text: Your brain is a garden. Your thoughts are the seeds. You can grow flowers, or you can grow weeds.

text: Never depend on a single income. Make investment to create a second source.

text: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.

text: The empires of the future are the empires of the mind.

text: Health is not valued till sickness comes.

text: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.

text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

text: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.

text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

author: Mark Twain

text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

text: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.

text: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep.

text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.

text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.

text: The groundwork for all happiness is good health.

text: Diversification is protection against ignorance.

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

text: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
author: B.F. Skinner

text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.

text: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

text: The way to wealth is as plain as the way to market. It depends chiefly on two words, industry and frugality.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people.
author: Steve Jobs

text: What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

text: The four most expensive words in the English language are 'This time it's different.'

text: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
author: Jonathan Swift

text: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: I think there is a world market for maybe five computers.
author: Thomas Watson

text: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
author: Proverb

text: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being.
author: Plato

text: The real question is not whether machines think but whether men do.
author: B.F. Skinner

text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

text: Rule No. 1: Never lose money. Rule No. 2: Never forget rule No. 1.

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Computers are incredibly fast, accurate, and stupid. Human beings are incredibly slow, inaccurate, and brilliant.

text: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
author: Philip Fisher

text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: The future is not some place we are going to, but one we are creating.
author: John Schaar

text: Every master was once a disaster.
author: T. Harv Eker

text: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
author: Ayn Rand

text: The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
author: William James

text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
author: Winston Churchill

text: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
author: Dhirubhai Ambani

text: A penny saved is a penny earned.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: I'm not a businessman, I'm a business, man.
author: Jay-Z

text: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
author: Edward Teller

text: Your net worth to the network is your net worth.
author: Tim O'Reilly

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The difference between successful people and really successful people is that really successful people say no to almost everything.
author: Warren Buffett

text: Machines take me by surprise with great frequency.
author: Alan Turing

text: Health is not about the weight you lose, but about the life you gain.
author: Dr. Josh Axe

text: Don't work for money; make money work for you.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
author: Bill Gates

text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

text: Buy when everyone else is selling and hold until everyone else is buying.
author: J. Paul Getty

text: Your body is a temple, but only if you treat it as one.
author: Astrid Alauda

text: The computer is a bicycle for the mind.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
author: Zig Ziglar

text: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, but the most adaptable to change.
author: Charles Darwin

text: Data is the new oil.
author: Clive Humby

text: The trouble with not having a goal is that you can spend your life running up and down the field and never score.
author: Bill Copeland

text: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Software is eating the world.
author: Marc Andreessen

text: A budget is telling your money where to go instead of wondering where it went.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

text: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: The robots are coming, but we don't have to be afraid. We can harness their capabilities.
author: John Markoff

text: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
author: Unknown

text: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution.
author: Aristotle

text: By far, the greatest danger of artificial intelligence is that people conclude too early that they understand it.
author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

text: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

text: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action.
author: Meister Eckhart

text: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it.
author: Bill Gates

text: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

text: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
author: Dolly Parton

text: Artificial intelligence would be the ultimate version of Google.
author: Larry Page

text: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make.
author: Dave Ramsey

text: To ensure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness.
author: William Londen

text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

text: The question of whether computers can think is like the question of whether submarines can swim.
author: Edsger Dijkstra

text: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Health is a state of complete harmony of the body, mind and spirit.
author: B.K.S. Iyengar

text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

text: Machine intelligence is the last invention that humanity will ever need to make.
author: Nick Bostrom

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain
